reviewText: This is a good basic (and eye opening) group of mini-lessons on contrasts in perspectives, and explanations for perspectives, as they relate to actual evidence we see all over the world. For those interested in research on the origins of our big beautiful planet, I highly recommend this series. If you have not completely closed your mind to possibilities that there is a God who created the Earth and that there is a book in the Holy Bible that contains a key to the history of the Earth that is collaborated by actual evidence we find all over the planet, you will find this series very interesting. ANSWERS ACADEMY- Biblical Apologetics for Real Life ! (13 Dvd Lessons)
class room settings as creation teacher explain their point of view. I learned alot
